name: Macintosh 128K
blurb: Warm beige plastics, calculated radii. The first mass-market GUI computer.

name: iMac G3
blurb: Translucent plastics revealing the machine inside. Design as competitive advantage.

name: Game Boy Color
blurb: Translucent variants showing the circuit board inside.

name: Rocket Appartamento
blurb: Polished steel, copper boiler, E61 group head. Pure thermodynamics.

name: Braun T3
blurb: Dieter Rams' pocket radio. Less but better.

name: Leica M3
blurb: The rangefinder that defined a generation of photojournalism.
